cli_content:
VRF: vrf1
BGP routing table information for VRF vrf1, address family IPv4 Unicast
BGP table version is 3, Local Router ID is 192.168.1.1
Status codes: s suppressed, d dampened, h history, * valid, > best, i - internal
Origin codes: i - IGP, e - EGP, ? - incomplete

   Network          Next Hop            Metric LocPrf Weight Path
*> 10.1.1.0/24      192.168.2.1              0          100      0 65001 i
*> 10.2.2.0/24      192.168.3.1              0          100      0 65002 i

VRF: vrf2
BGP routing table information for VRF vrf2, address family IPv4 Unicast
BGP table version is 5, Local Router ID is 192.168.2.1
Status codes: s suppressed, d dampened, h history, * valid, > best, i - internal
Origin codes: i - IGP, e - EGP, ? - incomplete

   Network          Next Hop            Metric LocPrf Weight Path
*> 172.16.1.0/24    192.168.4.1              0          100      0 65003 i
*> 172.16.2.0/24    192.168.5.1              0          100      0 65004 i
textfsm_template:
Value VRF (\S+)
Value BGP_TABLE_VERSION (\d+)
Value LOCAL_ROUTER_ID (\S+)
Value NETWORK (\S+)
Value NEXT_HOP (\S+)
Value METRIC (\d+)
Value LOC_PREF (\d+)
Value WEIGHT (\d+)
Value PATH (\S.*)

Start
  ^VRF:\s+${VRF}\s*$$
  ^BGP routing table information for VRF\s+${VRF},\s+address\s+family\s+.*$$
  ^BGP table version is\s+${BGP_TABLE_VERSION},\s+Local Router ID is\s+${LOCAL_ROUTER_ID}\s*$$
  ^\s*Network\s+Next Hop\s+Metric\s+LocPrf\s+Weight\s+Path\s*$$
  ^\s*[*]>?\s+${NETWORK}\s+${NEXT_HOP}\s+${METRIC}\s+${LOC_PREF}\s+${WEIGHT}\s+${PATH}\s*$$ -> Record
